column4: anybody use the Hauppauge WinTV-HVR-950Q to wach DTV in linux?
no but I have a similar card. What's your problem?
according to Google that card is alraedy supported by Linux for quite some time.
that's what it says at least on the official Hauppauge site (http://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/linux.html)
